properties.name: authentication.userid
properties.description: Email Id used for sending password

properties.name: application.security.type
properties.description: Type of security need to be configured

properties.name: app.datasource.type
properties.description: Data Source type to be used in security and user details

properties.name: security.allow.path
properties.description: Paths to be accessed without login

properties.name: sdrc.security.disable.createuser.endpoints
properties.description: Enable method level security on user creation

properties.name: sdrc.security.disable.frameOptions
properties.description: To disable the frame option in case you need x-frame
